name: The Road Journey
description:
It's time. The vacation you've been waiting for is finally here. But there's one problem, your flight got cancelled, so you'll have to go by car instead. Manage hunger, thirst, bathroom breaks, fuel, car maintenance  and time. Can you reach your destination?

Credits:

A.J.: Code, Art

Shawn: Music

Font: Gem Fonts
